Package org.daiitech.naftah

Class Naftah.NaftahCommand

java.lang.Object
org.daiitech.naftah.Naftah.NaftahCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
Naftah.NaftahCommand.InitCommand, Naftah.NaftahCommand.RunCommand, Naftah.NaftahCommand.ShellCommand
Enclosing class:
Naftah
private static class Naftah.NaftahCommand extends Object
The base command class for the Naftah CLI, implemented with picocli. Supports subcommands: run, init, and shell. TODO: add support for ManCammand (Manual), to list java apis in arabic (transliterated)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Naftah.NaftahCommand.InitCommand
    The 'init' subcommand that prepares Java classpath classes for Naftah reuse.

    The 'run' subcommand that interprets a Naftah script.
    private static final class 
    Naftah.NaftahCommand.ShellCommand
    The 'shell' subcommand that starts the interactive Naftah REPL.

    • process

      private boolean process(picocli.CommandLine.ParseResult parseResult) throws picocli.CommandLine.ParameterException, IOException
      Processes the parsed command line arguments and configures the environment.
      Parameters:
      parseResult - the parsed command line result
      Returns:
      true if processing succeeded; false otherwise
      Throws:
      picocli.CommandLine.ParameterException - if the command line is invalid
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
